评论详情: Went pretty well with some Victorian style stuff. It’s warm, a bit vampy as expected. I needed to size down a little, seems like it was sized more for men.

The medium fits my 5'6 140lb frame well. This fully-lined jacket has plenty of room for a longsleeve shirt underneath. The sleeves are long enough to cover part of my hand, which is fine for my purposes. I also appreciate the deep pockets. Expectations exceeded!
I love this coat! I wore it out and immediately got a compliment. The fit is as I expected it to be. Having said that, if someone had an issue, the tie on the back would give you a little leeway.
This is so adorable! Looks to be in good shape. Thank you!  Sincerely

Great fabric and details. True to size. I can't wait to wear it.

Beautifully will made, worth the price, and it's quality is amazing. Honestly, you could wear this out on a cold day and you would stay warm. Definitely worth buying either too wear or used for a costume.
This is a lovely fitting coat, well made and finished off, great fit, very happy with the coat, would recommend if you are looking for a quality frock coat.

评论概述: Absolutely LOVE this coat! SO many compliments
评论详情: I tend to buy things and then 'fix' them... AKA add to them, modify them, embellish them etc. I sew but dont always have time to make the complete item. I ordered this expecting to have to level it up. BUT its gorgeous as is.  Completely worth the cost. Its lined and the color is a very deep rich red.  Its a thick sturdy coat that holds its shape.  I'm 5'9", 190lbs with broad shoulders and long arms and this fit perfectly (i usually wear a 10-12 or L/XL in street clothing).  It gathered at my waist to give me a nice figure over my costume.  Highly suggest this item!  SO very very pleased with it. I had so many compliments.  Just buy it!!!

Love the fit , looks perfect for my pirate outfit!

评论概述: Gorgeous as a costume, has a quality look
评论详情: Really good looking and appears well made for a costume., out of sturdy materials. Velveteen-like outer fabric in a dark burgundy and a  polyester lining in black, with black braid trim very well done. Worth the money! It's for my granddaughter. She will love it. I had to get the xxlarge and glad I did. She wears a 14-16.  I am making a long white satin pirate shirt, with a lace center ruffle and blousy sleeves with ruffled cuffs, and adding a decorated black top hat, black lace gloves and mask, long dangling zirconia earrings, and a black corset waist belt to pull in the long waisted pirate shirt. It's all a surprise for her. I adore her and love to dress her up with great costumes. I might add a shiny  silver shoulder bag-purse. All she has to add is a pair of jeans or black tights and black boots. I hope she likes it.
